item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans!!! We are going to kick off April with another of Boston's great salsa socials, Fuego Y Candela. Below is the description from the organizer Franklin Condori. FYI: Once again there will not be a lesson because this is a social but there may be workshops. Remember you can always ask me anything salsa related. Can't wait!!!

This month at Fuego Y Candela, all the way from Florida, we have Ernesto Bulnes who will be doing workshops, performing, and DJing for all us!

Besides having the most perfectly combed hair in all of Salsa, Ernesto is a talented up-and-coming performer and DJ making a name for himself in Florida. He also hosts monthly socials by the name of Fuego En El 813! This month we are combining forces to bring you Fuego from Florida to our Fuego in Boston. Come to learn, stay for the show, and prepare to dance all night!

Prepare yourself for an evening of fun for all dancers alike. Prepare for "Fuego Y Candela en el 617"!!!

Workshops just added:
4pm-5pm Afro-Cuban Mambo Shines
5pm-6pm Mambo Turn Patterns

$15 for 1 Workshop
$25 for both!!

Music: DJ El Watusi

Date: April 6th, 2013

Time: 6:00pm-10:00pm

Cost: $8

Parking: Available on the street and in a municipal lot a block away at the corner of Cambridge Street and Warren Street.

http://mapq.st/h/4-mVJ84f5L

Hope to see you all there!!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Fuego Y Candela Salsa Social Meetup
